input2:
On admission to OSH, noted to have BP of 81/50 and Cr of 6. Pt was volume resuscitated with IVF, with improvement in BP and Cr returned to baseline of less than 1. Pt continued to have severe nausea and vomiting, with guaiac + stools. Work up was done to r/o bowel obstruction (see reports below). Upper GI did not show any obstruction but upper endoscopy on ___ showed duodenal stenosis. NG tube suction was initiated and pt reported improvement in symptoms. The plan was to rescope pt with plan to perform balloon plasty on ___ if necessary. Pt desired to be transferred to ___ where her primary MD practices and wished to get a second opinion.
.
Upon arrival at ___, pt was febrile and tachycardic with 
low-normal BP, however she denied any symptoms. Pt is feeling better than she ever has in a long time. No abdominal pain, n/v. Denies feelings of heart racing. No coughs.
input3:

HTN
Depression since ___ after pt was laid off
input4: Mom- HTN, ESRD. Grandmother - colon ca.

vitals: 101.7   ___  139    20   95% RA

Neck: Supple, no JVD

Lungs: CTAB 
Abdomen: +BS, NTND, soft, no guarding or rebound, no 
organomegaly
Ext: no edema, 1+ pulses DP
Neuro: AAOx3, CN II-XII grossly intact
